title: 求教
author: gbd
txt_content:

@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
"C:\Program Files\java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1G -jar "%BINDIR%\craftbukkit-1.5.2-R0.1.jar"
